subject: Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Football
Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: In a court filing, seven retired N.F.L. players say the current settlement does not adequately cover all retirees because only those with a limited number of illnesses will be eligible for cash awards.
snippet: In a court filing, seven retired N.F.L. players say the current settlement does not adequately cover all retirees because only those with a limited number of illnesses will be eligible for cash awards.
